example.eg: Do you have access to the computer room?
The rear access to the bar was locked.
Access to the President was controlled by his chief-of-staff.
example.egtrans: 总统的私人秘书控制着谁能够见到总统。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 接近, 见到, 拜访

example.eg: Let me know if you don't have access to that file, and I'll reset the permissions.
example.egtrans: 如果你打不开那份文件，请通知我，我会重设访问权限。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 存取（文件等），存取权，访问权

example.eg: Can you access that file or is it blocked?
example.egtrans: 您能访问那个文件吗？文件是不是被屏蔽了？

example.eg: In order to access the computer room, students have to use a special swipe card.
example.egtrans: 要进入计算机室，学生必须使用一张特制的磁卡。

dsense.name: access road
dsense.guideword: US (slip road on a motorway) (高速公路)

example.eg: The access road to the highway is actually a very long on-ramp.

dsense.name: access road
dsense.guideword: UK (special, express route) (与快速路平行)

example.eg: A vehicle has broken down on the access road, causing long traffic delays.
She has direct access to the prime minister.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直接接触某人的渠道, 直接接近某人的渠道

example.eg: A gate at the end of the garden gives direct access to the beach.
My church has finally installed both an elevator and a ramp to provide disabled access.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无障碍通道，残疾人专用通道

dsense.name: gain access to [sth]
dsense.guideword: (get permission to go to a place)

example.eg: The only means of access to the farm is the dirt track.
My first computer only had 16 kilobytes, but nowadays personal computers have 1 gigabyte or more of random access memory.
Road access to the airport is closed due to flooding.
Does the hotel have wireless access?
